questions.question: What is the dominant color depicted on the product's surface?
What specific citrus fruit is prominently featured in the design?
Describing the visual texture, what is the appearance of the fruit's surface?
What is the overall shape of the product as presented from this angle?
What appears to be the main material of the product's base?
What style of image constitutes the product's primary design element?
What is the apparent finish of the product's outer layer, glossy or matte?
Observing the design, does it primarily showcase a whole fruit or a slice?
What graphic effect is noticeable at the fruit's core, suggesting depth?
Considering the design, is the fruit image realistically rendered or stylized?
What is the apparent level of detail in the printed fruit image?
Does the design use a single fruit segment or multiple segments?
Is there any noticeable text or branding visible on the item itself?
What is the apparent condition of the product's surface; new or used?
What seems to be the intended function of the object based on visual cues?
